source.title: Brain network dynamics are hierarchically organized in time

confidence_rationale: Strong support for temporally organized brain-state regimes consistent with control-plane mode landscapes.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Large-scale brain dynamics show hierarchical temporal organization with metastable states and transitions.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports ARC-016 by grounding mode-regime persistence and transition structure in observed hierarchical state dynamics.
mapping.mapping_caveat: State decomposition choices can vary by model assumptions; not all inferred states map one-to-one to REE mode labels.
mapping.source_context: Resting-state and dynamic connectivity analyses across temporal scales.

confidence_components.notes: Useful for hysteresis/persistence assumptions but indirect for stream-level causality.
